product_name: Marmot Banzai Trestles 35 Sleeping Bag - Boys'
long_description: Snug like a bug, this 3-season bag is constructed from durable polyester with a soft lining and high-loft, thermally efficient synthetic insulation to deliver cozy warmth to your young one.
